text: 6.13: Ro 14.17; 1 Ko 6.15; 15.19-20; Kor 2.22-23; 1 Te 4.3-7Gumgi mbari khaŋ nzuai, “Mba, nta ndava mbuim, ana givi bigi ma. Ndav, ana mba nzuav ki ne ma.” Mba kameŋ, ne guigi guarara. Fhe Bakɨme, ana mbarkɨrga mba, ana ntan vhɨzɨv, ana vhɨra nzan ndavi, ana vhɨra nta vhɨzgirga. Nzan fhavi, nta ruarir mbigi gu gumgi wari ndir zav Fhe Bakɨme nta muuŋgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nzan fhavi, nta Guma Bakɨme ŋaara mbui fhavi ma. Guma Bakɨme, ana nzan fhavi gari.
